title: Custom Urf Emote
body:
It doesn't seem to be working

Do you need to have a level 4+ Mastery with the champ you get in order to use it? If so that's pretty crappy for an random champ select game mode :/

replies.body: In order to have that URF Emote work, you need to have the icon equipped while in an ARURF match. Double check that you're using the right icon, and snap a screenshot for me if it's still not working.
What icon are you referring to? I was able to use the emote for the last URF in February, but not now. So I should have this icon then.
Doesn't it kinda defeat the purpose to have Icon required missions then?

The Urf Icon is meant for URF Mode, while the Missions are aligned with the Arcade Event. They're two separate things going on, they just so happen to overlap. 

You can equip an arcade icon for mission progress, or equip the URF Icon for the emote, that decision is up to you!
